ChangeList.Description: Introduced the compliance eDiscovery API, including the [ediscoveryCase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/ediscoverycase?view=graph-rest-beta), [reviewSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reviewset?view=graph-rest-beta), and [reviewSetQuery](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reviewsetquery?view=graph-rest-beta), and operations.

ChangeList.Description: Added the [mgt-get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/get) component.
Added [Proxy provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/providers/proxy).
Added the **inherit-details** attribute to the [person card component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/person).
Added the **selectedPeople** property to the [people picker component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/people-picker).
Added the **loading** and **error** templates to the [people picker component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/people-picker).
Added the **task** and **task-details** templates to the [tasks component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/tasks).
Added the **isNewTaskVisible** property to the [tasks component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/tasks).
Added the **group-id** attribute to the [tasks component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/tasks).
Added the **taskFilter** property to the [tasks component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/tasks).
Added the **eventClick** event to the [agenda component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/agenda).
Added the **person-card** attribute to the [people component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/people).
Added the **user-ids** attribute to the [people component](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/toolkit/components/people).

Added the **allowNewTimeProposals** property to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) and [eventMessageRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessagerequest?view=graph-rest-beta) entities.

Added the **proposedNewTime** optional parameter to the [tentativelyAccept](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-tentativelyaccept?view=graph-rest-beta) and [decline](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-decline?view=graph-rest-beta) methods of **event**.

Added the [eventMessageResponse](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessageresponse?view=graph-rest-beta) entity that is based on [eventMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessage?view=graph-rest-beta), and in addition, includes the **proposedNewTime** and **responseType** properties.
Added the **proposedNewTime** property to the [attendee](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendee?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Introduced the ability to access Microsoft 365 data in bulk. For details, see [Microsoft Graph data connect (preview)](data-connect-overview.md).

Added the [bookingStaffMember](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/bookingstaffmember?view=graph-rest-beta) entity and the following CRUD methods:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/bookingbusiness-list-staffmembers?view=graph-rest-beta)

[bookingNamedEntity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/bookingnamedentity?view=graph-rest-beta)

Increased [JSON batching](json-batching.md) internal request limit from 5 to 20.
Added [JSON batching](json-batching.md) support. Internal request limit set to 20.

Add additional optional query filtering capability (by id) to [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) and [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: delta query,Get incremental changes to groups,Get incremental changes to messages in a folder,Get incremental changes to users
ChangeList.Description: Add delta function support to v1.0. Add to the following entities to perform [delta query](delta-query-overview.md):, contact, contactFolder, event, group, mailFolder, message, user, See the following for examples:, [Get incremental changes to groups](delta-query-groups.md), [Get incremental changes to messages in a folder](delta-query-messages.md), [Get incremental changes to users](delta-query-users.md)
ChangeList.Target: delta query,Get incremental changes to groups,Get incremental changes to messages in a folder,Get incremental changes to users

ChangeList.Description: Added deletedDateTime property to [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added deletedDateTime property to [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added deletedDateTime property to [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added operations on [domains](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-1.0)., New entities:</br>[domain](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-1.0), [domainDnsRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsrecord?view=graph-rest-1.0), [domainDnsCnameRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnscnamerecord?view=graph-rest-1.0), [domainDnsMxRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsmxrecord?view=graph-rest-1.0), [domainDnsSrvRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnssrvrecord?view=graph-rest-1.0), [domainDnsTxtRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnstxtrecord?view=graph-rest-1.0), [domainDnsUnavailableRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsunavailablerecord?view=graph-rest-1.0), New actions:</br>[verify](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-verify?view=graph-rest-1.0)
New entity:</br>[contract](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contract?view=graph-rest-1.0)
New entity:</br>[licenseDetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/licensedetails?view=graph-rest-1.0)

New [licensedetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-licensedetails?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Support for **$expand** to [get open extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/opentypeextension-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) in [administrativeUnit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta).

Support for [openTypeExtension](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/opentypeextension?view=graph-rest-1.0) in the following resources - [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0),[organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0).

When the user is signed-in with a personal Microsoft account, support for open extensions in the following resources - event, post, group, message, contact, and user. (This is in addition to these resources, plus device, group, organization and user, supporting open extensions when the user signs in using a work or school account.)

Support for **$expand** to [get open extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/opentypeextension-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) in the following resources: [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0),[organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0).

New resource [schemaExtension](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schemaextension?view=graph-rest-1.0) and CRUD methods to manage extension definitions for the following resources: [contact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0). Note that support for [administrativeUnit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) is still limited to the beta version as before.

The existing POST, GET, and PATCH methods of the following resources - [contact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) - now support adding, getting, and updating or deleting custom data stored as schema extensions in the corresponding resource instances.

You can now use **$filter** to look for resource instances with properties that match specific extension property values, such as extension name. See this [example](extensibility-schema-groups.md#5-get-a-group-and-its-extension-data) for details.

[Deleting a schema extension definition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/schemaextension-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) no longer affects accessing custom data that has been added based on that definition.
You can now set a schema extension complex type to null, to remove a schema extension from a resource instance.
Added new preview capability to allow Cloud Solution Provider pre-consented applications to call Microsoft Graph, described in a new [authorization topic](auth-cloudsolutionprovider.md).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: schema extensions,Add custom data to groups using Schema Extensions (preview)
ChangeList.Description: Extend Microsoft Graph with application data by using [schema extensions](extensibility-overview.md#schema-extensions).  This is supported on the following resources:, administrative unit, calendar event, device, group, message, organization, personal contact, post, user, See the following example:, [Add custom data to groups using Schema Extensions (preview)](extensibility-schema-groups.md)
ChangeList.Target: schema extensions,Add custom data to groups using Schema Extensions (preview)

ChangeList.Description: Provided an alternative way to create a schema extension definition without requiring a verified .com vanity domain. See [schema extensions](extensibility-overview.md#schema-extensions) for details.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: open extensions,Add custom data to users using open extensions (preview)
ChangeList.Description: Added resources that support [open extensions](extensibility-overview.md#open-extensions): , administrative unit, device, group, organization, user, See the following example:, [Add custom data to users using open extensions (preview)](extensibility-open-users.md)
ChangeList.Target: open extensions,Add custom data to users using open extensions (preview)

ChangeList.Description: Renamed former "Office 365 data extensions" as "open extensions".

ChangeList.Description: A new delta function add to the following entities to perform [delta query](delta-query-overview.md):, contact, contactFolder, event, group, mailFolder, message, user, See the following for examples:, [Get incremental changes to groups (preview)](delta-query-groups.md), [Get incremental changes to messages in a folder (preview)](delta-query-messages.md), [Get incremental changes to users (preview)](delta-query-users.md)
ChangeList.Target: delta query,Get incremental changes to groups (preview),Get incremental changes to messages in a folder (preview),Get incremental changes to users (preview)

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: daemon & long running processes in business scenarios
ChangeList.Description: The v2.0 auth endpoint now supports the client_credentials OAuth grant, which can be used for [daemon & long running processes in business scenarios](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/v2-oauth2-client-creds-grant-flow).
ChangeList.Target: daemon & long running processes in business scenarios

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: permission scopes that require administrator's consent,admin consent endpoint
ChangeList.Description: The v2.0 auth endpoint now supports [permission scopes that require administrator's consent](permissions-reference.md), via the [admin consent endpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/v2-permissions-and-consent#admin-restricted-permissions).
ChangeList.Target: permission scopes that require administrator's consent,admin consent endpoint

ChangeList.Description: The v2.0 auth endpoint now supports administrative consent for all users in a tenant, via the [admin consent endpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/v2-permissions-and-consent#admin-restricted-permissions).

Apps can use v1.0 Outlook Mail, Calendar, and Contacts APIs to access on-premises mailboxes in a hybrid deployment with Exchange 2016 Cumulative Update 3 (CU3). Find more details about REST API support in specific [hybrid deployments](hybrid-rest-support.md). **Note:** If you're using these sets of API in v1.0, you can now find your apps, including production apps, working for on-premises mailboxes that meet the specific hybrid deployment requirements. This capability is only in preview.
Query parameters without $ prefixes are supported as of 09/26/16. The $ prefix in query parameters is optional.
Added support for PATCH request against structural properties. For example: 'PATCH /me/mailboxSettings'.

Azure Active Directory is now used as a fallback for /beta/users/id/photo requests when Outlook is unable to service the request, for example when the user has no mailbox license or the tenant does not have an Exchange Online subscription. NOTE: this fallback is available for both GET and PATCH.
Added support for cast segment in expand path. For example: 'https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/messages?$expand=microsoft.graph.eventMessage/event'.
Added support for honoring _Accept-Encoding:gzip_.
Added support for cast segment in expand path. For example, 'https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/messages?$expand=microsoft.graph.eventMessage/event'.
Cleaned up subscription property names.

We've added the capability to discover (through _directorySettingTemplates_) and override the default behavior (by creating a _setting_ from the template) for entities and their associated functionality. Initially this only template provided is to control behaviors on Office groups.
Improved error message when resolving tenant alias and rejected JWT (AAD) tokens.
The location of the authorization service endpoint is now returned in the _www-authenticate_ header when a request is received with an empty bearer token.

The ability to filter on an entity's id property is now fixed. Example: GET https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users?$filter=id+eq+'x', Previously, any POST requests to service actions and functions require prefixing the action or function name with the microsoft.graph prefix. For example: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/Microsoft.Graph.getMemberGroups., The prefix is now no longer required (although it can still be specified). So the following would now also work: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/getMemberGroups.
Added _sharingInvitation_ property to provide details of any associated sharing invitation for this permission.
Removed various unimplemented types from the beta schema to more closely match the 1.0 schema.
-_/me/drive_ now works for both Microsoft accounts and Work and School accounts.
Drive requests for accounts whose OneDrive storage was provisioned on demand work more reliably and work in more scenarios where tenant default SharePoint sites use non-standard names.
Added support for complex type property sorting and filtering.
Added authorization_uri property in the www-authenticate header on a 401 response. This uri can be used to start the token acquisition flow.
Improved error messages across users and groups.
Added the [getM365AppUserDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportRoot-getM365AppUserDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) method.
Added the [getM365AppUserCounts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportRoot-getM365AppUserCounts?view=graph-rest-beta) method.
Added the [getM365AppPlatformUserCounts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportRoot-getM365AppPlatformUserCounts?view=graph-rest-beta) method.

Added a new resource type [relyingPartyDetailedSummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/relyingpartydetailedsummary?view=graph-rest-beta). This resource type supports [listing](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/relyingpartydetailedsummary-list?view=graph-rest-beta) the relying parties configured in Active Directory Federation Services.

Added the **Meeting Created** and **Meeting Interacted** properties to the [getEmailActivityCounts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getemailactivitycounts?view=graph-rest-beta) API CSV entity.

Added the **Meeting Created** and **Meeting Interacted** properties to the [getEmailActivityUserCounts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getemailactivityusercounts?view=graph-rest-beta) API CSV entity.

Added the **Meeting Created** and **Meeting Interacted** properties to the [getEmailActivityuserDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getemailactivityuserdetail?view=graph-rest-beta) API CSV entity.
Added **networkDisplayName** property to the [yammerGroupsActivityDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/yammerGroupsActivityDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Authorization for APIs to read Microsoft 365 usage reports
ChangeList.Description: For delegated permissions to allow apps to read Microsoft 365 service usage reports on behalf of a user, added Teams Service Administrator and Teams Communications Administrator as accepted user roles. For more details, see [Authorization for APIs to read Microsoft 365 usage reports](reportroot-authorization.md).
ChangeList.Target: Authorization for APIs to read Microsoft 365 usage reports

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Authorization for APIs to read Microsoft 365 usage reports
ChangeList.Description: For delegated permissions to allow apps to read Microsoft 365 service usage reports on behalf of a user, the tenant administrator must have assigned the user an Azure AD limited administrator role. For more details, see [Authorization for APIs to read Microsoft 365 usage reports](reportroot-authorization.md).
ChangeList.Target: Authorization for APIs to read Microsoft 365 usage reports

ChangeList.Description: Added the **deletedItemCount** and **deletedItemSizeInBytes** property to the [mailboxUsageDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxUsageDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **groupId** property to the [office365GroupsActivityDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/office365GroupsActivityDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **ownerPrincipalName** property to the [oneDriveUsageAccountDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/oneDriveUsageAccountDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **ownerPrincipalName** property to the [sharePointSiteUsageDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sharePointSiteUsageDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **office365Active** and **office365Inactive** properties to the [office365ServicesUserCounts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/office365ServicesUserCounts?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **deletedItemCount** property to the [mailboxUsageDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxUsageDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **deletedItemSizeInBytes** property to the [mailboxUsageDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxUsageDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **groupId** property to the [office365GroupsActivityDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/office365GroupsActivityDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added new reports for retrieving user registration and usage information:,
  • [reportroot-getcredentialusagesummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getcredentialusagesummary?view=graph-rest-beta) - Reports usage of self-service password reset.
  • [reportroot-getcredentialuserregistrationcount](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getcredentialuserregistrationcount?view=graph-rest-beta) - Reports the number of registrations for self-service password reset and multi-factor authentication.
  • [reportroot-list-credentialuserregistrationdetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-list-credentialuserregistrationdetails?view=graph-rest-beta) - Reports usage of self-service password reset and multi-factor authentication.
  • [reportroot-list-usercredentialusagedetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportroot-list-usercredentialusagedetails?view=graph-rest-beta) - Reports usage of self-service password reset for a user.
Added **ownerPrincipalName** property to the [oneDriveUsageAccountDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/oneDriveUsageAccountDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **ownerPrincipalName** property to the [sharePointSiteUsageDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sharePointSiteUsageDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Renamed the property **conditionalAccessPolicies** to **appliedConditionalAccessPolicy**.

Introduced additional risk properties in the [signIn API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-beta), including **riskDetail**, **riskLevelAggregated**, **riskLevelDuringSignIn**, **riskEventTypes**, and **riskState**.

Introduced additional sign-in properties in the [signIn API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-beta), including **authenticationProcessingDetails**, **originalRequestID**, **isInteractive**, **tokenIssuerName**, **tokenIssuerType**, **correlationId**, and **processingTimeinMilliseconds**.
Added the **Site ID** property to [getSharePointSiteUsageDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/reportroot-getsharepointsiteusagedetail?view=graph-rest-1.0).

These replaced the YammerGroupsActivity API.

Introduced the new preview API for Microsoft 365 reports. You can use it to get usage reports of how people in your business are using Microsoft 365 services. For example, you can identify who is using a service a lot and reaching quotas, or who may not need a Microsoft 365 license at all. For more details, see [report](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/report?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **itemInsights** navigation property to the **organizationSettings** entity.

Added the **itemInsightsSettings** entity and the following operations: ,  [Get itemInsightSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/iteminsightssettings-get?view=graph-rest-beta) ,  [Update itemInsightSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/iteminsightssettings-update?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the **profileCardProperties** navigation property to the [organizationSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organizationsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **profileCardProperty** entity and the following operations: ,  [List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/organizationsettings-list-profilecardproperties) ,  [Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/organizationsettings-post-profilecardproperties) ,  [Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilecardproperty-get?view=graph-rest-beta) ,  [Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilecardproperty-update?view=graph-rest-beta) ,  [Delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilecardproperty-delete).

Insights API is available in v1.0. This includes the [officeGraphInsights](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/officegraphinsights?view=graph-rest-1.0), [trending](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-trending?view=graph-rest-1.0), [usedInsight](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-used?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [sharedInsight](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/insights-shared?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources, and related types and methods. See [Why integrate with document-based insights?](social-intel-concept-overview.md#why-integrate-with-document-based-insights) for more information.
Added the [profile API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profile?view=graph-rest-beta) and associated methods.

Introduced the new workplace intelligence [analytics API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta) that enables you to get analytics about how users spend their time on various activities during and outside of working hours, including calls, chats (instant messages), emails, focus work, and meetings.

Introduced the new workplace intelligence [settings API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/settings?view=graph-rest-beta) that represents the current required settings for a user to use the [analytics API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta).

Introduced the new [activityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type and the following new resource types that are derived from it: [callActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/callactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [chatActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta),[emailActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/emailactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [focusActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/focusactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), and [meetingActivityStatistics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [settings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user-settings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity and the following CRUD methods:
[Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-get-settings?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-update-settings?view=graph-rest-beta)

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: People APIs,Get relevant information about people
ChangeList.Description: Added the [People APIs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/person?view=graph-rest-1.0) to v1.0. For details about the People API, see [Get relevant information about people](people-example.md).
ChangeList.Target: People APIs,Get relevant information about people

ChangeList.Description: Added People.Read.All permission. To learn more, please see [Permissions](permissions-reference.md).
Added the [personType](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persontype?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
The [scoredEmailAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scoredemailaddress?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource replaced the **rankedEmailAddress** resource.

The [person](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/person?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource was updated as follows:
  • The **scoredEmailAddresses** property (a collection of [scoredEmailAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scoredemailaddress?view=graph-rest-1.0) type) replaced the **emailAddresses** property
  • The **jobTitle** property replaced the **title** property
  • Removed **sources** and **mailboxType** properties
  • The **personType** property is now of [personType](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persontype?view=graph-rest-1.0) type instead of string type and replaces functionality of the previous **sources** and **mailboxType** properties
  • Added **imAddress** property
Removed the **personDataSource** resource.

Added the **assignedLabels**, **expirationDateTime**, **membershipRule**, **membershipRuleProcessingState**, **preferredLanguage**, and **theme** properties to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-v1.0) entity.

Added the [identitySecurityDefaultsEnforcementPolicy API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identitysecuritydefaultsenforcementpolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0), which represents Azure Active Directory security defaults policy.
Added [delta query](delta-query-overview.md) capability to [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-delta).
Added [delta query](delta-query-overview.md) capability for [oauth2PermissionGrant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/oauth2Permissiongrant-delta).

Added the **passwordChange** grant control to the [conditionalaccessgrantcontrols](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalaccessgrantcontrols?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [openIDConnectProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openidconnectprovider?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type, [availableprovidertypes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-list-availableprovidertypes?view=graph-rest-beta) method and [claimsMapping](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsmapping?view=graph-rest-beta) property.

Updated the [identityProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityprovider?view=graph-rest-beta) entity and the [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-post-identityproviders?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) and [post](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-post-identityproviders?view=graph-rest-beta) operations to include OpenID Connect Provider.
Added new entity types:, [conditionalAccessPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessPolicy),

Added new complex types:, [conditionalAccessSessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessSessionControl), [applicationEnforcedRestrictionsSessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/applicationEnforcedRestrictionsSessionControl), [cloudAppSecuritySessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/cloudAppSecuritySessionControl), [signInFrequencySessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signInFrequencySessionControl), [persistentBrowserSessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persistentBrowserSessionControl), [conditionalAccessSessionControls](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessSessionControls), [conditionalAccessApplications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessApplications), [conditionalAccessUsers](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessUsers), [conditionalAccessPlatforms](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessPlatforms), [conditionalAccessLocations](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessLocations), [conditionalAccessConditionSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessConditionSet), [conditionalAccessGrantControls](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessGrantControls),
Added the [namedLocation API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/namedLocation?view=graph-rest-v1.0), which represents named locations in Azure AD conditional access.
Added the [namedLocation API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/namedLocation?view=graph-rest-1.0), which represents named locations in Azure AD conditional access.
Added the **resourceBehaviorOptions** and **resourceProvisioningOptions** properties to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Removed the **isGuest** property from the [riskyUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuser?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [onPremisesPublishingSingleSignOn](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onpremisespublishingsinglesignon?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Changed in the [onPremisesAgent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onpremisesagent?view=graph-rest-beta),  [onPremisesAgentGroup](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onpremisesagentgroup?view=graph-rest-beta), and [publishedResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/publishedresource?view=graph-rest-beta) entity the publishingType value from **appProxy** to **applicationProxy**.

Added the [synchronizationJobSubject](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/synchronization-synchronizationJobSubject?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type

Added the **claimsMappingPolicies** relationship to the [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/servicePrincipal?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the **tokenLifetimePolicies** relationship to the [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/servicePrincipal?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [regionalAndLanguageSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/regionandlanguagesettings) entity.
Added the [regionalFormatOverrides](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/regionalformatoverrides) complex type.

Added the [regionalAndLanguageSettings-get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/regionalandlanguagesettings-get) function on the [regionalAndLanguageSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/regionalandlanguagesettings) resource.

Added the [regionalAndLanguageSettings-update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/regionalandlanguagesettings-update) function on the [regionalAndLanguageSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/regionalandlanguagesettings) resource.

Added the [regionalAndLanguageSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/resources/regionalandlanguagesettings) relationship to the [userSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userSettings) resource.

Updated [User](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource with clarification between [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) and [regionalAndLanguageSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/regionalandlanguagesettings).

Added the new **userPurpose** property to [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-beta). See [userPurpose resource type](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userPurpose?view=graph-rest-beta) for information on the supported use cases.
Added new [userPurpose](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userPurpose?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.

Added the [evaluateDynamicMembership](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-evaluatedynamicmembership?view=graph-rest-beta) action on [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta). Also added these supporting resource types:

Added support for [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription) to the **group** resource in [Microsoft Cloud China operated by 21Vianet](deployments.md).

Use this property instead of the **riskType** property to retrieve the type of Identity Protection risk detections.

ChangeList.Description: Added delegated permission [EntitlementManagement.Read.All](permissions-reference.md#entitlement-management-permissions).
Added the [authorizationPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authorizationpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type which controls authorization settings in Azure AD.
Added Facebook to the [identityProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityprovider?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource as an additional supported scenario.
Added new entity type: [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new entity type: [appRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approleassignment?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added app-only and delegated permissions [AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All](permissions-reference.md#application-resource-permissions).
Added the **externalUserState** and **externalUserStateChangeDateTime** properties to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added support for [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription) to the **user** resource in [Microsoft Cloud China operated by 21Vianet](deployments.md).

Added [unifiedRoleAssignmentMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroleassignmentmultiple?view=graph-rest-beta), [rbacApplicationMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/rbacapplicationmultiple?view=graph-rest-beta), and [appScope](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/appscope?view=graph-rest-beta) and the following actions:
  • [List unifiedRoleAssignmentMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignmentmultiple-list?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [Get unifiedRoleAssignmentMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignmentmultiple-get?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [Create unifiedRoleAssignmentMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroleassignmentmultiple-post?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [Update unifiedRoleAssignmentMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignmentmultiple-update?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [Delete unifiedRoleAssignmentMultiple](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignmentmultiple-delete?view=graph-rest-beta)
    • .
Added support for [delta queries for administrativeUnits](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/administrativeunit-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added support for [delta queries for oAuth2PermissionGrant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/oauth2permissiongrant-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [authenticationMethod](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationmethod?view=graph-rest-beta), [passwordAuthenticationMethod](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordauthenticationmethod?view=graph-rest-beta), and [phoneAuthenticationMethod](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/phoneauthenticationmethod?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.
Added the **createdByAppId** property to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added support for [delta queries for application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Typed policy resources are grouped under the [policies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policy-overview?view=graph-rest-1.0) URL segment. This update adds five typed policy resources:
  • [activityBasedTimeoutPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [claimsMappingPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0)
  • [tokenLifetimePolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) and
  • [tokenIssuancePolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Added [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, which controls automatic sign-out for web sessions after a period of inactivity, for applications that support activity-based timeout functionality.

Added the [claimsMappingPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, which controls the claims mapping for WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols, for tokens issued to a specific application.

Added the [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, which controls Azure Active Directory authentication behavior for federated users, in particular for auto-acceleration and user authentication restrictions in federated domains.

Added the [tokenLifetimePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, which controls the lifetime duration of access tokens used to access protected resources.

Added the [tokenIssuancePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, which controls the characteristics of SAML tokens issued by Azure AD. This allows you to set the signing algorithm, signing options, or SAML token version to be used to issue the SAML token.

Added the PrivilegedAccess.Read.AzureResources application permission for [Privileged Identity Management - Azure resources](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-resources?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the [Auditlogs.Read.All](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#user-permissions) permission for listing the sign-in activity of a user.

Added the [identitySecurityDefaultsEnforcementPolicy API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identitysecuritydefaultsenforcementpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents Azure Active Directory security defaults policy.
Added support for the **$top** and **$skiptoken** filters to support pagination on the [List provisioningObjectSummary](/api-reference/beta/api/provisioningobjectsummary-list) method.
Added the **authenticationRequirement** property and the **riskEventTypes_v2** property to the [signin](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added support for [delta queries for orgContact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/orgcontact-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new user permission [User.ManageIdentities.All](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#user-permissions).
Updated the conditional access APIs to use the /identity/ segment; for example, /beta/identity/conditionalAccess/policies.
Added the **devices** property to the [conditionalaccessconditionset](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalaccessconditionset?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [group: assignLicense API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-assignlicense?view=graph-rest-1.0), which can be used to assign license to a [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Updated the existing policies collection with a [policies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policy-overview?view=graph-rest-beta) URL segment. Typed policy resources are now grouped under the policies segment as described in [this blog post](https://developer.microsoft.com/identity/blogs/breaking-changes-policy-api-microsoft-graph-beta/). This update adds four typed policy resources:
  • [activityBasedTimeoutPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [claimsMappingPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) and
  • [tokenLifetimePolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls automatic sign-out for web sessions after a period of inactivity, for applications that support activity-based timeout functionality.

Added the [claimsMappingPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls the claims mapping for WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols, for tokens issued to a specific application.

Added the [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls Azure Active Directory authentication behavior for federated users, in particular for auto-acceleration and user authentication restrictions in federated domains.

Added the [tokenLifetimePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls the lifetime duration of access tokens used to access protected resources.

Added the [tokenIssuancePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls the characteristics of SAML tokens issued by Azure AD. This allows you to set the signing algorithm, signing options, or SAML token version to be used to issue the SAML token.
Added the [error](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/synchronization-synchronizationError?view=graph-rest-beta) property to the **quarantineStatus** resource type.

Updated the [accessPackageAssignmentPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accesspackageassignmentpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) with additional properties for requestor, approval and review settings.

Added the **latestSupportedTlsVersion** property to the [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. Specifies the latest TLS version that the notification endpoint supports. Allows subscribers to use a deprecated version of TLS for a limited period. For details, see [Microsoft Graph subscriptions - deprecating TLS 1.0 and 1.1](https://developer.microsoft.comhttps://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/blogs/microsoft-graph-subscriptions-deprecating-tls-1-0-and-1-1/).
ChangeList.Target: subscription,Microsoft Graph subscriptions - deprecating TLS 1.0 and 1.1

ChangeList.Description: Added application-level and delegated Policy.ReadWrite.ApplicationConfiguration permission for read and write operations on application configuration policies.

Added the [user: reprocessLicenseAssignment API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-reprocesslicenseassignment), which can be used to reprocess all group-based license assignments for the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Updated the existing policies collection with a [policies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policy-overview?view=graph-rest-beta) URL segment. Typed policy resources are now grouped under the policies segment as described in [this blog post](https://developer.microsoft.com/identity/blogs/breaking-changes-policy-api-microsoft-graph-beta/). This update adds four typed policy resources:
  • [activityBasedTimeoutPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [claimsMappingPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)
  • [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) and
  • [tokenLifetimePolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls automatic sign-out for web sessions after a period of inactivity, for applications that support activity-based timeout functionality.

[claimsMappingPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls the claims mapping for WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols, for tokens issued to a specific application.

[homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls Azure Active Directory authentication behavior for federated users, in particular for auto-acceleration and user authentication restrictions in federated domains.

[tokenLifetimePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls the lifetime duration of access tokens used to access protected resources.
Added the servicePrincipal property to [List provisioningObjectSummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioning-object-summary-list?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **identities** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. This property represents the set of identities (like local accounts and social accounts) that this user can use to sign in with.

Added the **hideFromAddressLists** and **hideFromOutlookClients** properties to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, to control the visibility of a group in the Outlook UI.

Updated the behavior of the **appRoleAssignments** and **appRoleAssignedTo** relationships on [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal.md) to return the roles as documented. **appRoleAssignments** returns app roles granted to the service principal and **appRoleAssignedTo** returns principals granted app roles to the service principal.
Added the new entity type [accessPackageResourceRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accesspackageresourcerequest?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Limited information returned for inaccessible member objects
ChangeList.Description: Added support for returning a limited amount of information when your application does not have access to some of the types in a response's collection. For more details, see [Limited information returned for inaccessible member objects](permissions-reference.md#limited-information-returned-for-inaccessible-member-objects).
ChangeList.Target: Limited information returned for inaccessible member objects

ChangeList.Description: Added new entity type: [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new delegated permissions [Application.Read.All](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions), [Application.ReadWrite.All](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions).
Added new application permission [Application.Read.All](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions).

Added new delegated and application permissions [GroupMember.Read.All](permissions-reference.md#group-permissions) and [GroupMember.ReadWrite.All](permissions-reference.md#group-permissions) to get and update the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added new application permission [Group.Create](permissions-reference.md#group-permissions) to create the **group** resource.
Added the **creationType** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation for the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation for the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation for the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added application-level Policy.Read.All permission for read operations in both conditional access policies and named locations.
Added support for report-only state: **enabledForReportingButNotEnforced**.
Updated the permissions required to perform write operations for both conditional access policies and named locations.
Added the **manufacturer** and **model** properties to the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new entity [calendarPermission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs to manage [calendarPermission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-beta) resources on [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new complex type [onlineMeetingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeetinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **isOnlineMeeting**, **onlineMeetingProvider** and **onlineMeeting** properties to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity. **isOnlineMeeting** and **onlineMeetingProvider** are optional parameters to the [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-post-events?view=graph-rest-beta) and [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-update?view=graph-rest-beta) methods of **event**.

Added the **defaultOnlineMeetingProviders** and **allowedOnlineMeetingProviders** properties to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isTallyingResponses** property to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isRemovable** property to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **delegateMeetingMessageDeliveryOptions** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **securityIdentifier** property to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **mdmAppId** property to the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added new entity [certificateBasedAuthConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificatebasedauthconfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [certificateAuthority](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificateauthority?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new relationship for **certificateBasedAuthConfiguration** on the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. This enables [certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/active-directory-certificate-based-authentication-get-started).
ChangeList.Target: organization,certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory

ChangeList.Description: Added the **hideFromAddressLists** and **hideFromOutlookClients** properties to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, to control the visibility of a group in the Outlook user interface.

Added the [assignLicense](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-assignlicense?view=graph-rest-beta) method which can be used to add or remove licenses on users in a [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added new entities: , [authenticationDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationDetail?view=graph-rest-beta), [keyValue](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/keyValue?view=graph-rest-beta), [networkLocationDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/networkLocationDetail?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the **alternateSignInName**, **ServicePrincipalId**, **ServicePrincipalName**, and **authenticationProcessingDetails** properties to the [signIn](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Moved the reference to [mfaDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mfadetail?view=graph-rest-beta) from [signIn](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-beta) to [authenticationDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationDetail?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **signInActivity** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added a new entity type: [Trustframeworkkeyset](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/trustframeworkkeyset?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added new entity type: [Identityuserflow](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityuserflow?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added new [entitlement management](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/entitlementmanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta) resources.

Added [removePassword](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-removepassword?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added **addIns** property to the [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [addPassword](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-addpassword?view=graph-rest-beta) and [removePassword](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-removepassword?view=graph-rest-beta) methods to the [serviceprincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **onPremisesDomainName**, **onPremisesNetBiosName**, and **onPremisesSamAccountName** properties to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **securityIdentifier** property to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **mdmAppId** property to the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **manufacturer** and **model** properties to the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added new [orgContact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/orgcontact?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. These contacts are managed by the organization, and are different from [personal contacts](outlook-contacts-concept-overview.md)
Added new [physicalOfficeAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/physicalOfficeAddress?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added new entity [certificateBasedAuthConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificatebasedauthconfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [certificateAuthority](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificateauthority?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new relationship for **certificateBasedAuthConfiguration** on the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. This enables [certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/active-directory-certificate-based-authentication-get-started).

ChangeList.Description: Added new entity types:, [conditionalAccessPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessPolicy),

Added new complex types:, [conditionalAccessSessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessSessionControl), [applicationEnforcedRestrictionsSessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/applicationEnforcedRestrictionsSessionControl), [cloudAppSecuritySessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/cloudAppSecuritySessionControl), [signInFrequencySessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signInFrequencySessionControl), [persistentBrowserSessionControl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persistentBrowserSessionControl), [conditionalAccessSessionControls](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessSessionControls), [conditionalAccessApplications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessApplications), [conditionalAccessUsers](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessUsers), [conditionalAccessPlatforms](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessPlatforms), [conditionalAccessLocations](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessLocations), [conditionalAccessDeviceStates](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessDeviceStates), [conditionalAccessConditionSet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessConditionSet), [conditionalAccessGrantControls](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessGrantControls),
Added the [namedLocation API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/namedLocation?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents named locations in Azure AD conditional access.

Added the [user: reprocessLicenseAssignment API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api-reference/beta/api/user-reprocesslicense?view=graph-rest-beta), which can be used to reprocess all group-based license assignments for the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the new **lastPasswordChangeDateTime** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

The **dateFormat** and **timeFormat** properties to the [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. The properties represent the user's preferred date and time formats.
Added the [objectIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/objectIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that represents an identity used to sign in to a user account.
Added **synchronizationJobSettings** property to the [synchronizationJob](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/synchronization-synchronizationjob?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added new possible values for the **reason** property in the [synchronizationQuarantine](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/synchronization-quarantine?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the capability to manage password single sign on credentials on the [servicePrincipal object](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **identities** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This property represents the set of identities that this user can use to sign in with.

The **dateFormat** and **timeFormat** properties to the [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. The properties represent the user's preferred date and time formats.

Changed the [List provisioningObjectSummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioning-object-summary-list?view=graph-rest-beta) namespace.

Added the [roleManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/roleManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that provides access to role definitions and role assignments surfaced from RBAC providers.

Added the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that represents a collection of permissions listing the operations that can be performed.
Added the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that grants access to resources.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List unifiedRoleDefinitions,Create unifiedRoleDefinition,Get unifiedRoleDefinition,Update unifiedRoleDefinition,Delete unifiedRoleDefinition
ChangeList.Description:
Added these operations to support the unifiedRoleDefinition resource:
  • [List unifiedRoleDefinitions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-list-roledefinitions?view=graph-rest-beta) - Get a list of unifiedRoleDefinition objects for the provider.
  • [Create unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-post-roledefinitions?view=graph-rest-beta) - Create a new unifiedRoleDefinition object.
  • [Get unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-get?view=graph-rest-beta) - Retrieve the properties and relationships of a unified role definition object.
  • [Update unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-update?view=graph-rest-beta) - Update the properties of a unifiedRoleDefinition object.
  • [Delete unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) - Delete a unifiedRoleDefinition object.
ChangeList.Target: List unifiedRoleDefinitions,Create unifiedRoleDefinition,Get unifiedRoleDefinition,Update unifiedRoleDefinition,Delete unifiedRoleDefinition
