Feature rollout policy helps tenant administrators to pilot features to specific groups before enabling them for entire organization.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: new delegated and application permissions,organization API,subcribedSku
ChangeList.Description: Added [new delegated and application permissions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference?#organization-permissions) _Organization.Read.All_ and _Organization.ReadWrite.All_ to get and update the [organization API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and get the [subcribedSku](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscribedSku?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
ChangeList.Target: new delegated and application permissions,organization API,subcribedSku

ChangeList.Description: Added the [group:validateProperties function](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-validateproperties?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [directoryobject:validateProperties function](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-validateproperties?view=graph-rest-1.0) on [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0), which validates that a Microsoft 365 group's display name or mail nickname complies with naming policies.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: new delegated and application permissions,directory role API,directory role template API
ChangeList.Description: Added [new delegated and application permissions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference?#organization-permissions) _RoleManagement.Read.Directory_ and _RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory_ to get and update the [directory role API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryRole?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and get the [directory role template API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryRoleTemplate?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
ChangeList.Target: new delegated and application permissions,directory role API,directory role template API

ChangeList.Description: Added the [riskDetection API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskdetection?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents risk detections in Azure AD Identity Protection.

Introduced the new resource type [applicationTemplate](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/applicationtemplate.md). This resource type supports [instantiate](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/applicationtemplate-instantiate.md), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/applicationtemplate-instantiate.md) and [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/applicationtemplate-get.md) applications from the Azure AD application gallery.

Added new resources: </br> [detailsInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/detailsInfo?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [initiator](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/initiator?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [modifiedProperty](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/modifiedProperty?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [provisionedIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisionedIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [provisioningObjectsummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioningObjectsummary?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [provisioningStep](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioningStep?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [provisioningsystemDetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioningsystemDetails?view=graph-rest-beta)</br> [statusBase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/statusBase?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the [List provisioningObjectSummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioning-object-summary-list?view=graph-rest-beta) operation</br>
Added the **signInSessionsValidFromDateTime** property on the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [revokeSignInSessions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-revokesigninsessions?view=graph-rest-1.0) action on the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **lastPasswordChangeDateTime** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added **assignedlabels** property to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity. This property represents the list of sensitivity label pairs (label ID, label name) associated with a group.
Added the [riskyUserHistoryItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuserhistoryitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [list history](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/riskyuser-list-history?view=graph-rest-beta) operation.

Added new application permissions for **access reviews** APIs: AccessReview.Read.All, ProgramControl.Read.All and ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All. For details, see the [access reviews API reference](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessreviews-root?view=graph-rest-beta).

Add the **signInSessionsValidFromDateTime** property on the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This is a rename of the **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** properties, but both properties will be supported to allow clients to migrate smoothly. In the next couple months the old property, **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** will be removed.

Add the **revokeSignInSessions** action on the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This is a rename of the **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** action, but both service actions will be supported to allow clients to migrate smoothly. In the next couple months the old service action, **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** will be removed.

Introduced a new resource type [trustFrameworkPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/trustframeworkpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) to support [Azure Active Directory B2C](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory-b2c/active-directory-b2c-overview). This resource type supports  [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframework-post-trustframeworkpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframework-list-trustframeworkpolicies?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframeworkpolicy-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframework-put-trustframeworkpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframerkpolicy-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) operations.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: audit logs APIs for Azure AD
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the new **audit logs APIs for Azure AD** providing activity logs for directory management tasks through [directoryAudit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryAudit?view=graph-rest-1.0) and sign-in activity through [signIns](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signIns?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Add the **passwordNotificationWindowInDays** and **passwordValidityPeriodInDays** properties on the [domain](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Add the **complianceExpirationDateTime**, **profileType** and **systemLabels** properties on the [device](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Add the **isResourceAccount** property on the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Introduced [Confirm riskyUsers compromised](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyusers-confirmcompromised?view=graph-rest-beta) method, which allows admins to confirm users as compromised in Azure AD Identity Protection.

Introduced [Dismiss riskyUsers](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyusers-dismiss?view=graph-rest-beta) method, which allows admins to dismiss users marked as risky in Azure AD Identity Protection.
Introduced **isProcessing** property to the [riskyUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuser?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

The [targetResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/targetresource?view=graph-rest-beta) type now includes properties previously available to derived types that are no longer supported.

The following derived types are no longer supported and have been removed: **targetResourceDevice**, **targetResourceDirectory**, **targetResourceGroup**, **targetResourcePolicy**, **targetResourceRole**, **targetResourceServicePrincipal**, **targetResourceUser**, and **targetResourceOther**.

Add the **passwordNotificationWindowInDays** and **passwordValidityPeriodInDays** properties on the [domain](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added new resource type [directoryObjectPartnerReference](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryobjectpartnerreference?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Add the **createdDateTime** property on [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Updated the **companyName** property on the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource to be writeable.

To support configuring an identity provider in an Azure AD B2C tenant, introduced new resource type [identityProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityprovider?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity and the [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-post-identityproviders?view=graph-rest-1.0), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) operations.
Added the **createdDateTime** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added new method transitiveMembers on [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembers?view=graph-rest-1.0). This method returns a flat list of members including nested members.

Added new method transitiveMemberOf on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-1.0), [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta) and [devices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new properties to [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0): **employeeId**, **faxNumber**, **onPremisesDistinguishedName**, **showInAddressList** and **otherMails**.
Added the **forceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa** property to the [passwordProfile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordprofile?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the **licenseAssignmentStates** property to the [User](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).
Added the **licenseAssignmentState** resource for [Group Based Licensing](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Added the **assignedLicenses**, **licenseProcessingState** and **hasMembersWithLicenseErrors** properties and **membersWithLicenseErrors** relationship to [Group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Added new entity [dataPolicyOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/datapolicyoperation?view=graph-rest-1.0). This represents a submitted data policy operation for tracking purposes.

Added the [exportPersonalData](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-exportpersonaldata?view=graph-rest-1.0) action on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/users?view=graph-rest-1.0). This action submits a data policy operation request to export personal data stored by Microsoft for a user.
Added method [dataPolicyOperations](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/datapolicyoperation-get?view=graph-rest-1.0). This retrieves properties of the dataPolicyOperation object.

Added new property **expirationDateTime** to [groups](https://docs.microsoft.comhttps://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) for [group expiration](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/users-groups-roles/groups-lifecycle).
Added new resource type [directoryObjectPartnerReference](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryobjectpartnerreference?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **createdDateTime** property to the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Restructured the [organizational contacts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/orgcontact?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. The physical address properties (**city**, **country**, **postalCode**, **streetAddress**, and **state**) and **officeLocation** are now in an **addresses** collection (of new [physicalOfficeAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/physicalofficeaddress?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type), and **mobilePhone**, **businessPhones** and **faxNumber** are now in a **phones** collection. **companyName** and **imAddresses** have also been added

Added method **memberOf** to get a [devices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) direct [membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-memberOf?view=graph-rest-1.0). This method has been added for getting the list of memberships including nested memberships.
Added property **registeredRoot** to the [governanceResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceresource?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Renamed property **onboardDateTime** of the [governanceResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceresource?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to **registeredDateTime**.
Added new action [register resource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceresource-register?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new  **progress** property to [dataPolicyOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/dataPolicyOperation?view=graph-rest-beta). This specifies the progress of an operation.

Added new method transitiveMembers on [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembers?view=graph-rest-beta). This method returns a flat list of members including nested members.

Added new method transitiveMemberOf on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta), [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta), [devices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta) and [service principals](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added method memberOf to get a devices direct [membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-members?view=graph-rest-beta). This method has been added for getting the list of memberships including nested memberships.
Added new properties to [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta): **faxNumber**, **onPremisesDistinguishedName**, and **otherMails**.
Added the **forceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa** property to the [passwordProfile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordprofile?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the 'externalUserState' and 'externalUserStateChangeDateTime' properties to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) object.

Added the [forceDelete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-forcedelete?view=graph-rest-1.0) action to [domains](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new method transitiveMembers on [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembers?view=graph-rest-beta). This method returns a flat list of members including nested members.

Added new method transitiveMemberOf on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta), [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta), [devices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta) and [service principals](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-list-transitivemembersof?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added method memberOf to get a devices direct [membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-members?view=graph-rest-beta). This method has been added for getting the list of memberships including nested memberships.
Added new properties to [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta): **faxNumber**, **onPremisesDistinguishedName**, and **otherMails**.

Added the **licenseAssignmentStates** property to the [User](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).
Added the **licenseAssignmentState** resource for [Group Based Licensing](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Added the **assignedLicenses**, **licenseProcessingState**, **hasMembersWithLicenseErrors** and **membersWithLicenseErrors** properties to [Group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Introduced [riskyUsers API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuser?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents Azure AD users who are at risk, as detected by Azure AD Identity Protection.
Change the [privilegedapproval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedapproval?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [privilegedroleassignmentrequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedroleassignmentrequest?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and following methods and actions:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/privilegedroleassignmentrequest-list?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/privilegedroleassignmentrequest-post?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Cancel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/privilegedroleassignmentrequest-cancel?view=graph-rest-beta)
[My](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/privilegedroleassignmentrequest-my?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added [Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/privilegedrolesettings-update?view=graph-rest-beta) for [privilegedRoleSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedrolesettings?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added [delta query](delta-query-overview.md) capability for [directoryObject](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/directoryobject-delta?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/directoryrole-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0) function for [directoryRole](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryrole?view=graph-rest-1.0) to support [change tracking using delta query](delta-query-overview.md).
Alternative behavior to return changed properties only in JSON response for [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Alternative behavior to return changed properties only in JSON response for [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).

The [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) and [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs will be updated in preview (beta). The first set of changes will be applied on July 16, 2018. The changes include property renaming and restructuring. Most of the existing properties will not be available until the changes are completed. There will be new properties added. The changes will be released in preview (beta) prior to releasing to v1.0.

Added the [access reviews](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessreviews-root?view=graph-rest-beta) feature to [Azure AD](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azure-ad-overview?view=graph-rest-beta).

New application permissions _Application.ReadWrite.All_ and _Application.ReadWrite.OwnedBy_ that allows a client app to create, read, update, and delete applications and service principals as described in the [permissions topic](permissions-reference.md#application-resource-permissions).
Added **ageGroup**, **legalAgeGroupClassification**, and **ConsentRequiredForMinor** properties to [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [privilegedAccess](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedaccess?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [governanceResource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceresource?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and the following methods and actions:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceresource-list?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceresource-get?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the [governanceSubject](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governancesubject?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [governanceRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceroledefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and tollowing methods and actions:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroledefinition-list?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroledefinition-get?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the [governanceRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceroleassignment?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and following methods and actions:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroleassignment-list?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroleassignment-get?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Export](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroleassignment-export?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the [governanceRoleAssignmentRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceroleassignmentrequest?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and following methods and actions:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroleassignmentrequest-list?view=graph-rest-beta)

[Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceroleassignmentrequest-update?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the [governanceRoleSetting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governancerolesetting?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and the following methods and actions:
[List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governancerolesetting-list?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the following complex types:

[governanceRoleAssignmentRequestStatus](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceroleassignmentrequeststatus?view=graph-rest-beta)

[governanceSchedule](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceschedule?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the **importance** property to the [post](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Renamed the **creatorUserId** property of the [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to **creatorId** to better reflect its meaning.

Added the [getUserOwnedObjects](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/directory-deleteditems-user-owned?view=graph-rest-beta) function to the [directory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to list the deleted groups owned by a given user.

Added the **legalAgeGroup, ageGroup and consentProvidedForMinor** complex type to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added users and groups support to [webhook](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/webhooks?view=graph-rest-1.0) notification subscriptions.

Added the new **masterCategories** navigation property to the [outlookUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookuser?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. **masterCategories** is a collection of [outlookCategory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookcategory?view=graph-rest-1.0) objects.
Added the [outlookCategory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookcategory?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added the following CRUD operations for [outlookCategory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookcategory?view=graph-rest-1.0): [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookuser-post-mastercategories?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookcategory-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookcategory-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookcategory-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the new [supportedLanguages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookuser-supportedlanguages?view=graph-rest-1.0) function to the [outlookUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookuser?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added the new [supportedTimeZones](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookuser-supportedtimezones?view=graph-rest-1.0) function to the [outlookUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookuser?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added the new **workingHours** property to [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0). See [workingHours resource type](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workinghours?view=graph-rest-1.0) for information on the supported use cases.

Added the following new complex types:
[workingHours](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workinghours?view=graph-rest-1.0)
[timeZoneBase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timezonebase?view=graph-rest-1.0)
[customTimeZone](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/customtimezone?view=graph-rest-1.0)
[standardTimeZoneOffset](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/standardtimezoneoffset?view=graph-rest-1.0)
[daylightTimeZoneOffset](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/daylighttimezoneoffset?view=graph-rest-1.0)
Added [groupLifecyclePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/grouplifecyclepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Added the following APIs for group lifecycle policy: [Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-post-grouplifecyclepolicies?view=graph-rest-1.0), [List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Add group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-addgroup?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Remove group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-removegroup?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Added [List groupLifecyclePolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-grouplifecyclepolicies?view=graph-rest-1.0) function to [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Added renewedDateTime property and [renew](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-renew?view=graph-rest-1.0) to [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0)
Added the **applicationID** and **creatorUserID** properties to the [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-list?view=graph-rest-beta) operation to the [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added new entity [dataPolicyOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/datapolicyoperation?view=graph-rest-beta). This represents a submitted data policy operation for tracking purposes.

Added the [exportPersonalData](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-exportpersonaldata?view=graph-rest-beta) action on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/users?view=graph-rest-beta). This action submits a data policy operation request to export personal data stored by Microsoft for a user.

Added the **onPremisesExtensionAttributes** complex type to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity. This contains the on-premises AD extension attributes 1-15.
Added the **privacyProfile** complex type to the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: restoring and permanently deleting users and groups
ChangeList.Description: Added support for [restoring and permanently deleting users and groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-1.0).

ChangeList.Description: Added the [agreement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreement?view=graph-rest-beta) and [agreementAcceptance](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreementacceptance?view=graph-rest-beta) resources.

Added the following APIs for [agreement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreement?view=graph-rest-beta): [Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/greement-post-agreements?view=graph-rest-beta), [List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [Get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [Delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [agreementAcceptance](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreementacceptance?view=graph-rest-beta) relationships to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Add optional delta query filtering capability to [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Add optional delta query filtering capability to [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the [identityProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityprovider?view=graph-rest-beta) entity and the [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-post-identityproviders?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-update?view=graph-rest-beta), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) operations.

Added the new **workingHours** property to [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-beta). See [workingHours resource type](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workinghours?view=graph-rest-beta) for information on the supported use cases.

Added the following new complex types:
[workingHours](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workinghours?view=graph-rest-beta)
[timeZoneBase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timezonebase?view=graph-rest-beta)
[customTimeZone](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/customtimezone?view=graph-rest-beta)
[standardTimeZoneOffset](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/standardtimezoneoffset?view=graph-rest-beta)
[daylightTimeZoneOffset](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/daylighttimezoneoffset?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added [groupLifecyclePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/grouplifecyclepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the following APIs for group lifecycle policy: [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-post-grouplifecyclepolicies?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [add group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-addgroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [remove group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-removegroup?view=graph-rest-beta), and [renew a group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-renewgroup?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [List groupLifecylePolicies](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-grouplifecyclepolicies?view=graph-rest-beta) function to [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **employeeId** property to [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added support for group settings., New resource types: [groupSetting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/groupsetting?view=graph-rest-1.0), [groupSettingTemplate](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/groupsettingtemplate?view=graph-rest-1.0), [settingValue](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/settingvalue?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [settingTemplateValue](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/settingtemplatevalue?view=graph-rest-1.0)
Added property **classification** and navigation property **settings**  to [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Changed navigation property scopedAdministratorOf to scopedRoleMemberOf for [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Changed navigation property scopedAdministrators to scopedRoleMembers for [administrativeUnit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Changed navigation property scopedAdministrators to scopedMembers for [directoryRole](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryrole?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Added support for [restoring and permanently deleting users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta).

changelog.WorkloadArea: Added user resource support for deleted items

ChangeList.Description: New entity: [OnPremisesProvisioningError](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onpremisesprovisioningerror?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added OnPremisesProvisioningError property to [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta), [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta), and [orgcontact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/orgcontact?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the **drives** and **sites** navigation properties to **group**.

Adminstrative unit APIs will be updated in preview (beta). The first set of changes will be applied on May 3, 2017. The changes include the following property renaming:
- **roleMemberInfo** complex type to **identity** complex type for the scopedRoleMembership entity
- **scopedAdministratorOf** navigation property to **scopedRoleMemberOf** for the user entity
- **scopedAdministrators** navigation property to **scopedRoleMembers** for the administrativeUnit entity
- **scopedAdministrators** navigation property to **scopedMembers** for the directoryRole entity

The [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) and [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs will be updated in preview (beta). The first set of changes will be applied on May 15, 2017. The changes include property renaming and restructuring. Some properties (such as appRoles and addIns) will not be available until the changes are completed. The changes will be released in preview (beta) prior to releasing to v1.0.

Added new onPremises properties onPremisesDomainName, OnPremisesSamAccountName, and onPremisesUserPrincipalName to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **HiddenMembership** as an additional value for the visibility property to the [Group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
New resource:</br>[contract](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contract?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added functions on [domains](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta)., New entities:</br>[domain](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsCnameRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnscnamerecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsMxRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsmxrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsSrvRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnssrvrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsTxtRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnstxtrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsUnavailableRecord](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsunavailablerecord?view=graph-rest-beta), New actions:</br>[forceDelete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-forcedelete?view=graph-rest-beta)</br>[verify](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-verify?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added support for [restoring and permanently deleting groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta)., New entity: directory with deleteditems navigation property.
New entity:</br>[Endpoint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/endpoint?view=graph-rest-beta)

New [endpoints](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-endpoints?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property on [groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta)
New entity:</br>[licenseDetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/licensedetails?view=graph-rest-beta)

New [licensedetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-licensedetails?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property on [users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta)
New entity:</br>[contract](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contract?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added invitedUserType property to the invitation entity type, that defines the type of user (**Guest** or **Member**) that is invited.

We will be removing the invitedToGroups property from the invitation entity-type on 11/11/2016. This means that you will no longer be able to add an invited user to a group using this API. Instead, use the [add member API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-post-members?view=graph-rest-1.0) to add a user to a group.
Added **membershipRule** property contains rules that controls the memberships for this group, if the group is a dynamic group.
Added **membershipRuleProcessingState** property to control whether dynamic membership processing is on or paused for this group.
Set the **groupTypes** property to contain **"DynamicMembership"** to light up the dynamic groups capability for this group.
Added **preferredLanguage** property to indicate the preferred language for a Microsoft 365 group.
Added **theme** property to specify a Microsoft 365 group's color theme.

As part of the schema change where the type of two location properties is being replaced by a new complex type in the identityRiskEvents endpoint, the following properties are changed/added in the identityRiskEvents endpoint:</br>**location**  changed from Edm.String to ComplexType signInLocation., **previousLocation** changed from Edm.String to ComplexType signInLocation., **signInLocation** new ComplexType that contains city, state, countryOrRegion and geoCoordinates properties., **geoCoordinates** new ComplexType that contains latitude and longitude properties.

Invitation manager APIs are now available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. You can use invitation manager APIs to create an invite, in order to add an external user to the organization. As part of the invitation, you can also choose to add the invited user to a Microsoft 365 group. For more details, see [invitation manager](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** read-only property to indicate when refresh or session tokens are valid from. Any tokens issued before this time are invalid, and any attempt to use them would force a new sign-in for the user.
Added **showInAddressList** property to control if the Outlook global address list should contain this user.

Added **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** service action that invalidates all of the user's refresh and session tokens issued to applications, by resetting the **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** user property to the current date-time.

Added the [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type, which includes the **automaticRepliesSetting**, **timeZone**, and **language** properties.
Added the **mailboxSettings** property to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Privileged Identity Management,Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta,Azure AD Privileged Identity Management
ChangeList.Description: Privileged Identity Management (PIM) REST APIs now are available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. [Privileged Identity Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/privileged-identity-management/pim-configure) provides just in time activation for privileged Azure AD organizational roles such as Global Administrator, Billing Administrator, and so on. You can use the published APIs to write applications that retrieve and update privileged role assignments, and activate users into roles. For details, see [Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) and [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: Privileged Identity Management,Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta,Azure AD Privileged Identity Management

ChangeList.Description: Introduced the new Administrative Unites preview API. Administrative units allow organizations to subdivide their Azure Active Directory, and delegate administrative duties to those subdivisions. Subdivisions can represent regions, departments, cost centers, etc. This can now be managed through the Microsoft Graph API.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Introduction of a new preview API to Microsoft Graph: IdentityRiskEvents
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the new IdentityRiskEvents preview API. This API works in conjunction with Azure Active Directory Identity Protection. You can use it to query risk events generated by Identity Protection. For more details, see the [Introduction of a new preview API to Microsoft Graph: IdentityRiskEvents](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/identityriskevents-api-preview/) blog post.
ChangeList.Target: Introduction of a new preview API to Microsoft Graph: IdentityRiskEvents

ChangeList.Description: Added _extensions_ to the **post** entity, which is abstract type to support the OData v4 open type openTypeExtension.
Added _timeZone_ to _mailboxsettings_.
Added API _findMeetingTimes_to _user_.

_displayName_ is now returned for Microsoft accounts.

The [educationTeacher](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationteacher) **externalId** property is now returned when using delegated permissions.
The [educationStudent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationstudent) **externalId** property is now returned when using delegated permissions.
Added **lms** to the list of possible values for **educationExternalSource**.

Added the [classSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamclasssettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) property to the [team](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource to allow callers to get settings specific to a team of type Class.

Added the [classSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamclasssettings?view=graph-rest-beta) property to the [team](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to allow callers to get settings specific to a team of type Class.

Removed [previously announced](https://developer.microsoft.com/onenote/blogs/breaking-change-education-api-updates-in-microsoft-graph-beta) deprecated properties **grade** and **feedback** from [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta). Access grades and feedback only through [educationOutcome](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsubmission-list-outcomes?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview) support to [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview) to [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationClass?view=graph-rest-beta).

Introduced new relatedContacts property on [educationUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationUser?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Updated the possible values of **educationSubmissionStatus** type in the status property of  [educationsubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **educationAssignmentIndividualRecipient** complex type to the assignTo property of [educationAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationassignment?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **unsubmittedBy**, **unsubmittedDate**, **returnedBy**, **returnedDate** property of [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [return](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsubmission-return?view=graph-rest-beta) and  [unsubmit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsubmission-unsubmit?view=graph-rest-beta) action to [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).
Removed the release and  recall action on [educationSubmission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta).

The scope **Members.Read.Hidden** is required to read or update the **Members** collection on an [educationClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationclass?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity using app-only tokens.
Added the reportableIdentifier property to [educationsynchronizationerror](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsynchronizationerror?view=graph-rest-beta).
Updated the response options for the [uploadUrl](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsynchronizationprofile-uploadurl?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
Updated the text for description of the [educationSynchronizationError](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsynchronizationerror?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Updated the text for description of the [get sync errors](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/educationsynchronizationerrors-get?view=graph-rest-beta) API.

Added support for education scenarios, including the following resources:, [Schools](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationschool?view=graph-rest-beta), [Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationclass?view=graph-rest-beta), [Users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationuser?view=graph-rest-beta), [Assignments](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationassignment?view=graph-rest-beta), [Submissions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta), See the resource topics for details about the methods that are available.

Added the [workbookOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workbookoperation) relationship to the [workbook](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workbook?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the  [Get workbookOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/workbookoperation-get) method to the [workbookOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workbookoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) entity

Added the **legacyId** property to the [Excel Table](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/table?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. This will contain the numeric value identifier (string data type) that will remain constact for a given Excel table. This is provided as an additional metadata if the application relied on the legacy identifier used in older Excel client applications. Note: The **id** and **legacyId** property should be treated as an opaque string value and should not be parsed to any other type within your application.

Added workbookPivotTable resource, refresh and refreshAll action on pivotTables, workbookRangeView resource, visibleView action on the filtered range to return workbookRangeView to the user, get rows collection and range resource off of visibleView, columnsAfter, columnsBefore, resizedRange, rowsAbove, and rowsBelow functions off of range resource, and new table properties.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Power your apps with the new Excel REST API on the Microsoft Graph
ChangeList.Description: Excel REST API on Microsoft Graph is generally available. Now you can build rich and deep integrations with Excel workbooks in Microsoft 365. See the [Power your apps with the new Excel REST API on the Microsoft Graph](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/power-your-apps-with-the-new-excel-rest-api/) blog post for more details.
ChangeList.Target: Power your apps with the new Excel REST API on the Microsoft Graph

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph
ChangeList.Description: We are adding new Excel REST APIs that let you read and modify data in an Excel workbook. It is now possible to build smart apps that allows users to get value out of the content stored in an Excel workbook by providing insights into the data. Take advantage of analytical powers of Excel, create tables and charts and extract visually appealing chart image - all from within your app. For details, see [Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph

ChangeList.Description: Added the **allowNewTimeProposals** property to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [eventMessageRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessagerequest?view=graph-rest-1.0) entities.

Added the **proposedNewTime** optional parameter to the [tentativelyAccept](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-tentativelyaccept?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [decline](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-decline?view=graph-rest-1.0) methods of **event**.

Added the [eventMessageResponse](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessageresponse?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity that is based on [eventMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0), and in addition, includes the **proposedNewTime** and **responseType** properties.
Added the **proposedNewTime** property to the [attendee](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendee?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

The [delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) function supports an additional scenario to get incremental changes (new, updated, or removed) of events in a user calendar without necessarily being bounded by a date range.

Places API available in v1. Added the [place](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-1.0), [room](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-1.0), [roomList](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources and their methods to provide rich details for locations in apps.
Added pagination support for the [places API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new entity [calendarPermission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) APIs to manage [calendarPermission](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources on [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [onlineMeetingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeetinginfo?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the **isOnlineMeeting**, **onlineMeetingProvider** and **onlineMeeting** properties to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. **isOnlineMeeting** and **onlineMeetingProvider** are optional parameters to the [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-post-events?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) methods of **event**.

Added the **defaultOnlineMeetingProviders** and **allowedOnlineMeetingProviders** properties to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isTallyingResponses** property to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isRemovable** property to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **delegateMeetingMessageDeliveryOptions** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxSettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Support for [file attachments up to 150MB](outlook-large-attachments.md) for an [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) instance.
[Adding file attachments up to 150MB](outlook-large-attachments.md) to a [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) instance.

The [attachmentItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type, [createUploadSession](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-createuploadsession?view=graph-rest-1.0) action for the [attachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachment?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, and the **attachmentType** enumeration.
Added the **calendarGroupId** property to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isDraft** property to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the ability to [update a room or roomlist](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added support for the [Mail.ReadBasic](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#mail-permissions) delegated permission and [Mail.ReadBasic.All](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#mail-permissions) application permission to [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) subscriptions for change notifications on message.

Added the **conversationIndex** property to [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) and its derived type [eventMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List messages,Get message,List mail folders,Get mail folder,List child folders,List messages in folder,Get message delta,Get mail folder delta,Create,get,update,delete

ChangeList.Description: [Adding file attachments up to 150MB](outlook-large-attachments.md) to a [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) instance.

The [attachmentItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type, [createUploadSession](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-createuploadsession?view=graph-rest-beta) action for the [attachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachment?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and the **attachmentType** enumeration.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get the raw contents of a file or item attachment
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to [get the raw contents of a file or item attachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-get?view=graph-rest-1.0#get-the-raw-contents-of-a-file-or-item-attachment) to an event, message, or group post.
ChangeList.Target: get the raw contents of a file or item attachment

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get the MIME content of a message
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to [get the MIME content of a message](outlook-get-mime-message.md).
ChangeList.Target: get the MIME content of a message

ChangeList.Description: Added the [room list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/roomlist?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added the [room](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added the [place](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added delegated and application [permissions for the places API](permissions-reference.md#places-permissions): Place.Read.All

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder
ChangeList.Description: Added support for the Mail.ReadBasic.All application permission in mailFolder API: [list mailfolders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-beta), [get a mailfolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [list child folders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list messages in a mail folder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta). Also added Mail.ReadBasic.All support in [delta query for message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delta query for mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder
ChangeList.Description: Added support for the Mail.ReadBasic permission in mailFolder API: [list mailfolders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-beta), [get a mailfolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [list child folders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list messages in a mail folder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta). Also added Mail.ReadBasic support in [delta query for message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delta query for mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability for administrators to limit app access to only specific mailboxes, even when an app has been granted application permissions to mail, mailbox settings, calendars, or contacts. For more details, see [Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes](auth-limit-mailbox-access.md).
ChangeList.Target: Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes

ChangeList.Description: Added the [mailSearchFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailsearchfolder?graph-rest-1.0) entity, which is derived from and supports the methods of the [mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added support for a new [Mail.ReadBasic (preview) permission](permissions-reference.md#mail-permissions) for [List Messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Get Message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to [get the MIME content of a message](outlook-get-mime-message.md).
